General.Name: GO.D.M Investments Ltd
General.Description: GO.D.M Investments Ltd. does not have significant operations. The company holds patents in the field of pharma and acquires rights related to application of components. It was formerly known as Gamma Communications Production and Marketing (1991) Ltd. and changed its name to GO.D.M Investments Ltd. in January 2007. GO.D.M Investments Ltd. was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Herzliya, Israel.
General.Address: 89 State of the Jews, Herzliya, Israel, 4676672
